fullContent: Home› CarHill Climb CarsBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHill Climb Cars is a 2D driving game where you steer your cute car on the road with many residences and shops on the wayside. Pass all of them and move forward until you reach the finish line. You will face many ups and downs along the track. Try not to lose steering control in this one of the coolest car games!How to Play Hill Climb CarsThere are 30 unique levels to complete. The difficulty of the levels will increase as you make progress. Your primary mission is to drive your vehicle to the finish line without any potential flipover. There will be many highs and lows along the way. So, you must move cautiously. Don’t lose your control over the car. If it flips over, you will have to play that level from the beginning.Give It a Style!The best part of this driving game is that you can customize your car as you wish.Enter the customization section by clicking on the wrench icon from the menu.You will see many cars here. You have the first two vehicles in the beginning.Other options are unlockable as you earn coins over time. Select your favorite one and tap on the arrow icon.It is time to choose the color of your vehicle in this section.You can also upgrade your vehicle’s engine and suspension features here for more power.Bounce the CarYour vehicle can flip while passing over a high place or entering a pothole while driving on the road. If it hits the ground severely, you will lose the game as the car will explode. You may try to bounce your vehicle to return it to its original state to prevent such cases. This game will put your driving skills to the ultimate test!ControlsWASD / Arrow Keys: Steer the CarSpacebar: BounceDeveloperHill Climb Cars was developed by FreezeNova.What is More?If you are a Hill Climb Cars fan, you may also give Crazy Hill Climb a chance. You will control a cabriolet as an elephant driver in the game! You can choose your driver among many cartoon animals, such as a reindeer and a toucan to travel with.
